courses.title: Beginner Guitar Mastery
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing guitar, including chords, strumming, and simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: A deep dive into advanced piano techniques, including arpeggios, improvisation, and sight-reading.

courses.title: Music Theory Essentials
courses.description: Understand music theory concepts such as scales, chords, progressions, and key signatures.

courses.title: Drumming for Beginners
courses.description: A step-by-step guide to drumming techniques, rhythms, and patterns for new drummers.

courses.title: Vocal Training & Singing Techniques
courses.description: Improve your vocal skills with exercises on breathing, pitch control, and performance techniques.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Learn how to produce EDM and electronic tracks using DAWs like Ableton Live and FL Studio.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation Masterclass
courses.description: Explore the art of jazz improvisation and learn how to solo with confidence over complex changes.

courses.title: Sight Reading Bootcamp
courses.description: Build your ability to sight-read music fluently, with practical drills and reading exercises.

courses.title: Songwriting for Modern Artists
courses.description: Write, structure, and polish your own songs with tips from industry professionals.

courses.title: Film Scoring Fundamentals
courses.description: Discover how to compose music for film and television, using MIDI, orchestration, and mood.
